title: This NYSE-Listed Food Company Aims to Stack $1.2 Billion in Bitcoin
contentSnippet: DDC's share price was up nearly 7% after announcing that it had raised an additional $124 million for Bitcoin purchases.

title: Price predictions 10/8: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, SOL, DOGE, ADA, HYPE, LINK, SUI
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s brief pullback from its all-time high has not altered the bullish longer-term view, but bulls will have to swiftly push the price above $126,200 to retain the advantage.

title: Solana DeFi Exchange Jupiter to Launch Native Stablecoin
contentSnippet: Solana DEX and DeFi protocol Jupiter is expanding its feature set with the launch of its own stablecoin, JupUSD, on Solana.

title: Poll shows crypto-focused candidates could sway voters in US midterms
contentSnippet: With more than a year until US elections to determine control of Congress, a new poll suggested some crypto-minded Democratic voters could be swayed to vote Republican.

title: Stablecoins: The Revolution in Global Money Transfers
contentSnippet: Stablecoins are no longer just a bridge between crypto and fiat — they are becoming the rails of global commerce, writes Nonco CEO Fernando Martinez.

title: North Dakota to Issue Stablecoin With Fiserv as Digital Dollar Trend Expands
contentSnippet: The Fiserv-powered U.S. dollar stablecoin will be available to local banks and credit unions, joining crypto experiments by U.S. states.

title: The State of DeFi Exploit Risk
contentSnippet: DeFi protocols can rival or surpass traditional financial security standards and introduce frameworks to better assess risks in real-world asset applications for smarter capital allocation, says Cicad

title: 3 reasons XRP’s time spent under $3 could be short-lived
contentSnippet: Despite XRP’s dip below $3, strong whale accumulation, ETF optimism and bullish technicals suggest a rebound is brewing.

title: Tezos Shooter ‘Reaper Actual’ From EverQuest Co-Creator Enters Alpha Playtesting
contentSnippet: John Smedley, the man behind EverQuest, H1Z1, and PlanetSide, has debuted his crypto shooter into an alpha playtesting phase.

title: MetaMask Adds Support for Hyperliquid Swaps, Eyes Polymarket Integration
contentSnippet: MetaMask also unveiled a rewards system.

title: Square offers Bitcoin payments for merchants as crypto adoption accelerates
contentSnippet: Square’s new Bitcoin service lets US merchants accept BTC at checkout, hold it in a built-in wallet and get zero fees on transactions.

title: The Protocol: 77% of Bitcoin Holders Have Never Used BTCFi, Survey Reveals
contentSnippet: Also: Ethereum Fusaka Upgrade on Holesky, DoubleZero Goes Live and Bee Maps Raises $42M.

title: CZ Family Office Kickstarts $1 Billion Builder Fund on BNB
contentSnippet: Binance co-founder Changpeng Zhao's family office is setting aside $1 billion for long-term builders on BNB Chain.

title: Satoshi’s $100B+ dormant Bitcoin stash: What happens if it finally moves
contentSnippet: Satoshi’s $100-billion Bitcoin hoard remains untouched. In case it enters the market, it might have unexpected outcomes.

title: Stellar (XLM) Rebounds Sharply as Institutional Interest Fuels Recovery Momentum
contentSnippet: XLM climbed back above $0.39 after a brief sell-off, with rising open interest signaling renewed institutional confidence.

title: Coinbase Debuts Crypto Staking in New York, Citing Deal With State Regulators
contentSnippet: After years of restrictions, the company now allows customers in the state to earn yield on ETH, SOL, and other crypto tokens.

title: Solana's Jupiter to Develop JupUSD Stablecoin With Backing From Ethena Labs
contentSnippet: JupUSD will be developed in partnership with Ethana Labs and initially be fully collateralized by Ethana's USDtb stablecoin.

title: Bitcoin’s On-Chain Profitability Has Surged With 97% of Supply Now in Profit: Glassnode
contentSnippet: Glassnode says bitcoin’s breakout to record highs came on the back of $2.2 billion in ETF inflows and steady accumulation from smaller holders, not speculative hype.

title: This Trend Has Marked Local Tops in Bitcoin, but This Time May Be Different
contentSnippet: Despite increasing by 450,000 BTC since July, short-term holders remain below prior highs, signaling tempered market sentiment.

title: Ethereum’s Fusaka Upgrade Could Cut Node Costs, Ease Adoption
contentSnippet: Fusaka – a blend of the names Fulu and Osaka – consists of two simultaneous upgrades to Ethereum’s consensus and execution layers, respectively.

title: HBAR Breaks Out of Consolidation as ETF Hopes and Investor Interest Rise
contentSnippet: Hedera’s native token climbed 2% in a steady 24-hour advance, capped by a late-session breakout fueled by renewed volume.

title: Why Is BNB So Resilient Amid the Crypto Market Pullback?
contentSnippet: BNB sits just 2% from record high while other major cryptos have fallen.

title: Pump.Fun rival FORM eyes 40% rally after CZ declares ‘BNB meme szn’
contentSnippet: Four.Meme has surpassed rival Pump.Fun’s daily revenue in the past 24 hours was $1.4 million, compared to the latter’s $885,000.

title: Coinbase enables staking for NY residents after regulatory approval
contentSnippet: Coinbase has launched crypto staking in New York, allowing residents to earn rewards on assets such as ETH and SOL following state regulatory approval.

title: DOGE price gained 445% the last time this indicator flashed green
contentSnippet: The last two times Dogecoin price rallied 300% and 445% after its monthly RSI produced a bullish cross, and the same signal has now flashed again.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Dubai’s crypto grand strategy aims to challenge Asian crown
contentSnippet: Dubai deploys oil wealth and Islamic finance to challenge Asian crypto dominance, but Hong Kong’s liquidity firepower and Beijing backing maintain supremacy.

title: Morning Minute: Polymarket Raises $2B at $9B Valuation from NYSE Parent
contentSnippet: The bigger part of the announcement is the new integration and distribution Polymarket gains via this partnership.

title: Over $489M in Crypto Longs Liquidated as Bitcoin, Ethereum Extend Losses
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's drop triggered $641 million in liquidations, but analysts see a healthy correction with a path to $135K if ETF inflows resume.

title: British Duo On Trial for Planning to Steal $23m in Crypto—From Behind Bars
contentSnippet: The pair are accused of planning robberies that targeted holders of “significant amounts of cryptocurrency assets” from jail.

title: ビットフライヤー、「スカイ（SKY）」の取扱い開始　メイカーダオ後継トークン
contentSnippet: bitFlyerは、メイカーダオ（MakerDAO）の後継トークン「スカイ（SKY）」の取扱いを開始。取扱記念キャンペーンも実施し、販売所での購入が可能となった。

title: IG証券、ビットコインETF・イーサリアムETFのCFD取引を提供開始
contentSnippet: IG証券がビットコインETF・イーサリアムETFのCFD取引を開始。制度化が進む日本市場で、税区分や課税扱いを巡る動向にも注目が集まる。

title: 「ビットコインは金に比べ著しく過小評価」ライトスパークCEO語る
contentSnippet: ライトスパークCEOのデービッド・マーカス氏が、ビットコインは金と比較して著しく過小評価されており、金と同等の価値なら1BTC=130万ドルに達すると主張した。金価格が史上最高値の4000ドルを突破する中、JPモルガンもビットコインが過小評価されていると指摘し、16.5万ドルの価格予測を発表している。

title: トランプミームコイン発行企業、2億ドル調達でトレジャリー企業設立へ＝報道
contentSnippet: TRUMPミームコイン発行企業が最低2億ドルの資金調達を計画中とブルームバーグが報道。低迷するトークン蓄積のためデジタル資産トレジャリー企業設立を目指す。

title: 米金融大手BNYメロン、トークン化預金を検討＝報道
contentSnippet: BNYメロンがトークン化預金の導入検討をブルームバーグが報道。1日2.5兆ドルの決済を処理する同行がブロックチェーン活用でインフラ近代化を推進。

title: 「仮想通貨への投資は今でも遅すぎない」パンテラ幹部が見解
contentSnippet: パンテラキャピタルのゼネラルパートナーがビットコイン、イーサリアム、ソラナなど仮想通貨投資の将来性を語った。ファンドマネージャーの多くが投資しておらず拡大余地ありとする。

title: クリーンコア、ドージコイン保有量7.1億DOGE到達　含み益30億円超に
contentSnippet: 米NYSE上場のクリーンコアソリューションズが公式ドージコイン・トレジャリーの保有量7.1億DOGE突破を発表。10億枚目標に向けビットスタンプ提携で取得継続中。

title: 米SEC、仮想通貨企業向け「イノベーション免除」制度を年内にも正式化へ
contentSnippet: SECのアトキンス委員長が8日、仮想通貨企業向けの「イノベーション免除」制度を年内か2026年第1四半期に正式化する意向を示した。政府閉鎖が規則制定の進展を妨げている。

title: トレジャリー企業とETFのイーサリアム保有量、供給の10％以上に到達
contentSnippet: 企業とETFによる仮想通貨イーサリアムの保有額が供給の10%を突破した。ビットマインやシャープリンクが大量蓄積を続ける一方、過熱へ注意を呼びかける論者も。最新動向を解説する。

title: ビットコイン史上最高値圏で急落、デリバティブ市場は強気継続を示唆｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインは7〜8日にかけて、史上最高値付近まで上昇したのち急落するという激しい値動きを見せた。最高値圏では流動性が極めて薄く、ボラティリティが急拡大しやすい局面にある。
